definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Stealth Bombers now gain a bonus to fitting siege missile launchers instead of cruise missile launchers.
sentences.chinese: 隐轰获得了适合会战发射器的加成来代替巡航。

sentences.english: It consists of a semi-automatic 20mm smart-grenade launcher.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个半自动20毫米智能榴弹发射器组成。

sentences.english: His kneepads conceal rocket dart launchers.
sentences.chinese: 他的护膝里藏有火箭飞镖发射器。

sentences.english: Electron-emitting device, electron source substrate, imaging apparatus and production method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 电子发射器件，电子源基片，成像设备及其生产方法。

sentences.english: On the Dragon’s stub-wings the 40mm ROCKET LAUNCHERS open up with a BARRAGE of leaping fire which FLASHES down and
sentences.chinese: 飞龙战机的短翼上，40毫米火箭发射器一齐开火。

sentences.english: I'm going after the missile launcher inside that Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 我准备死盯着奔驰车里的导弹发射器。

sentences.english: When transformed into walking mode, the launchers are angled for antipersonnel use.
sentences.chinese: 当变为行走模式时，发射器则转为反步兵。

sentences.english: A bundle of microphones listens for a bullet or RPG.
sentences.chinese: 一束麦克风用于监听子弹或榴弹发射器。

sentences.english: The Americans returned fire with heavy machine guns and grenade launchers.
sentences.chinese: 美国人用重机枪和榴弹发射器回击。

sentences.english: Transmitters emit waves of a certain frequency in the direction of the target.
sentences.chinese: 发射器朝目标方向发射一定频率的无线电波。

sentences.english: Electron-emitting device, electron source substrate, and image-forming apparatus and production method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 电子发射器件，电子源基片，成象设备及其生产方法。

sentences.english: Corps-level firepower was provided by Nebelwerfer multiple rocket launchers .
sentences.chinese: 军机的火力配置还有尼贝尔霍夫多管火箭发射器。

sentences.english: Air Cannons produces five models of launchers, ranging in size.
sentences.chinese: 空气炮公司生产五种型号的发射器，按大小排列。

sentences.english: Lucy dropped the missile launcher and helped Kurt pull Tom up.
sentences.chinese: 露西扔下导弹发射器帮库尔特把汤姆拖起来。

sentences.english: A four-barrel smoke grenade launcher is mounted on each side of the turret.
sentences.chinese: 在炮塔每侧安装一具四管烟榴弹发射器。

sentences.english: Now they've put transmitters on two Black Storks in central Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 现在他们在蒙古中部把发射器放在两只黑鹳身上。

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
